onset.Description: Onset of the trial, defined by the 'TS-ON' (Trial Start) event marker.

duration.Description: Duration of the trial, calculated as the time difference between the 'STOP' (End of trial) and 'TS-ON' (Trial Start) event markers.

trial_type.Description: Categorical type of the trial, indicating the grip and force requirements.

Levels.SGLF: Side Grip Low Force trial (Grip first cueing)
Levels.SGHF: Side Grip High Force trial (Grip first cueing)
Levels.PGLF: Precision Grip Low Force trial (Grip first cueing)
Levels.PGHF: Precision Grip High Force trial (Grip first cueing)
Levels.LFSG: Low Force Side Grip trial (Force first cueing)
Levels.HFSG: High Force Side Grip trial (Force first cueing)
Levels.LFPG: Low Force Precision Grip trial (Force first cueing)
Levels.HFPG: High Force Precision Grip trial (Force first cueing)
Levels.NONE: No specific trial type (e.g., aborted or non-task related event)

response_time.Description: Time of the subject's response, defined by the 'SR' (table switch released) event marker.
